attributes.action: revise Family Law so that equal rights are given to all involved in hearings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Family Law is well-overdue for being reviewed and revised. Women have such an immense advantage over men under this aspect of "Law". There is no gender equality; in fact, women have been increasing their advantages in this area for far too long!
A man stands absolutely no chance of 'playing on a level playing field'; in fact, he may as well just GIVE UP!
We are not asking for anything other than to be given equal rights with women! Is this asking too much?
Where Family Law is concerned, "equal rights" just do not exist! Too many men's lives are absolutely devastated by the ramifications of decisions made by District Judges under this completely outdated system.
I ask all people who agree with this to vote for it, please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
